following describes the validation process: 1. 一个值，从目标属性传输到源属性时，在数据绑定引擎首先移除任何可能已添加到附加属性的绑定元素。When a value is being transferred from the target property to the source property, the data binding engine first removes any that may have been added to the attached property of the bound element. 然后检查是否有任何自定义定义为该，在这种情况下它将调用上的每个方法s 直到其中一个运行时出错或全部规则都通过为止。It then checks if there are any custom s defined for that , in which case it calls the method on each of the s until one of them runs into an error or until all of them pass. 2. 后不会传递的自定义规则，绑定引擎就会创建对象，并将其添加到的绑定元素集合。Once there is a custom rule that does not pass, the binding engine creates a object and adds it to the collection of the bound element. 当不为空，元素的附加的属性设置为`true`。When is not empty, the attached property of the element is set to `true`. 此外，如果的属性设置为`true`，然后，绑定引擎会引发附加在元素上的事件。Also, if the property of the is set to `true`, then the binding engine raises the attached event on the element. 3. 如果所有规则都通过，绑定引擎然后调用转换器，如果存在。If all of the rules pass, the binding engine then calls the converter, if one exists. 4. 如果转换器通过，绑定引擎将调用的源属性的 setter。If the converter passes, the binding engine calls the setter of the source property. 5. 如果绑定具有与其关联，并在第 4 步期间引发异常，绑定引擎检查以查看是否存在。If the binding has an associated with it and an exception is thrown during step 4, the binding engine checks to see if there is a . 可以选择使用回调以提供自定义处理程序处理异常。You have the option to use the callback to provide a custom handler for handling exceptions. 如果中未指定，绑定引擎就会创建与该异常并将其添加到的绑定元素集合。If an is not specified on the , the binding engine creates a with the exception and adds it to the collection of the bound element. 另请注意，在任一方向 （目标到源或源到目标） 的有效值传输清除。附加的属性。Also note that a valid value transfer in either direction (target-to-source or source-to-target) clears the .attached
